item.title: Shyam Benegal dies: Akshay Kumar, Manoj Bajpayee and Shekhar Kapur mourn demise of veteran filmmaker, call him 'legend' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Shyam Benegal dies: Akshay Kumar, Manoj Bajpayee and Shekhar Kapur mourn demise of veteran filmmaker, call him 'legend'

Date: December 23, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Shyam Benegal, celebrated Indian filmmaker, passed away on December 23 at the age of 90. His death has prompted an outpouring of tributes from Bollywood celebrities who remembered him as a legend and visionary in Indian cinema.

  • Benegal had recently celebrated his 90th birthday.
  • He was known for his pioneering work in Indian parallel cinema.
  • His daughter confirmed his passing, citing the great loss it represents.
  • He won multiple National Awards and was honored with Padma Shri and Padma Bhushan.
‚ÄúPained to know of Shyam Benegal ji‚Äôs demise. One of the finest filmmakers in our country, truly a legend. Om Shanti.‚Äù - Akshay Kumar
‚ÄúA heartbreaking loss for Indian cinema...his legacy will live on in the stories he told and the lives he touched.‚Äù - Manoj Bajpayee

Benegal's influence on Indian cinema is celebrated widely, and his legacy as a storyteller will continue to inspire future generations.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 19 Early Trends: History Has Been Created, Allu Arjun Inaugurates 700 Crore Club! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 19 Early Trends: History Has Been Created, Allu Arjun Inaugurates 700 Crore Club

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Koimoi

Ahead of the Christmas vacation and New Year festivity, Pushpa 2 (Hindi) is setting itself to explode like anything at the Indian box office. After enjoying the rush for 18 straight days, it was expected to slow down on the third Monday, but it remains strong, flirting with the 10 crore mark and creating history by becoming the first Hindi film to enter the 700 crore club.

  • Pushpa 2 has broken numerous records in Hindi cinema.
  • It surpassed Stree 2‚Äôs collection of 627.50 crores to become the highest-grossing Hindi film.
  • The film maintained strong occupancy rates despite weekend fluctuations.
  • Day 19 projections suggest earnings between 9-10 crores.
  • Total box office collection so far lies between 701.50-702.50 crores.
‚ÄúAllu Arjun has inaugurated the 700 crore club.‚Äù

This remarkable performance indicates potential future earnings, possibly setting the stage for the next milestone in Hindi film collections.

item.title: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Not Finished Yet, But‚Ä¶‚Äú: James Gunn Teases How Long ‚ÄòSuperman‚Äô Will Be - Collider
item.description:
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Not Finished Yet, But‚Ä¶‚Äù: James Gunn Teases How Long ‚ÄòSuperman‚Äô Will Be

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Collider

The highly anticipated first trailer for James Gunn's 'Superman' has collected over 250 million views in just 24 hours. Gunn hinted at a runtime of "under two and a half hours" for the film, generating excitement and expectations among fans.

Key Points

  • The trailer for 'Superman' gained over 250 million views in 24 hours.
  • James Gunn stated the film's runtime will be "under two and a half hours".
  • The story focuses on Clark Kent reconciling his heritage and human upbringing.
  • The cast includes David Corenswet as Superman and Rachel Brosnahan as Lois Lane.
  • The film is set to be released on July 11, 2025.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not finished yet so I don‚Äôt know. Under two and a half hours.‚Äù ‚Äî James Gunn

The new 'Superman' film promises action and character depth, appealing to both established fans and new audiences alike.

item.title: Karthik Subbaraj to give a solid treat to Suriya fans for Christmas - 123telugu
item.description:
Karthik Subbaraj to give a solid treat to Suriya fans for Christmas

Published on Dec 23, 2024 | Source: 123 Telugu

Director Karthik Subbaraj is set to delight Suriya fans with the release of the title teaser for his upcoming movie, Suriya44, on Christmas Day. The film marks a significant project for Suriya, who is coming off a series of less successful outings.

  • The title teaser of Suriya44 will be released on December 25, 2024.
  • Suriya44 is a love story infused with action elements.
  • Pooja Hegde stars as the female lead, with Shriya Saran contributing a special song.
  • The film is anticipated to release on April 10, 2025.
  • Music for the film is composed by Santosh Narayanan, and it is produced by Suriya's 2D Entertainment.
‚ÄúThe One‚Äôs Xmass Gift üéÅ #Suriya44 #TheOneXmass #LoveLaughterWar‚Äù ‚Äî Karthik Subbaraj

This film gives Suriya fans much to look forward to as Karthik Subbaraj aims to make a significant comeback for the actor.

item.title: Shyam Benegal ‚Äî the boy from Alwal who put Hyderabad on national movie map - The Hindu
item.description:
Shyam Benegal ‚Äî the boy from Alwal who put Hyderabad on national movie map

Published on: December 23, 2024 at 09:55 pm IST

Source: The Hindu

Shyam Benegal, a significant figure in Indian cinema, passed away recently, leaving behind a legacy of films shot in and around Hyderabad, which shaped the national film landscape.

  • Benegal was born in Alwal on December 14, 1934, and witnessed India's Freedom Struggle.
  • His films often spotlighted social issues, including the Telangana Armed Struggle.
  • Notable films include Ankur, Nishant, and Well Done Abba.
  • He collaborated with famous playwrights and actors, elevating the status of parallel cinema in India.
‚ÄúHe always responded to messages and calls, so when there was no response on December 15 for the birthday greetings, I was expecting the worst.‚Äù

Shyam Benegal's contributions to film have had a lasting impact, influencing generations of filmmakers and audiences alike.

item.title: Horoscope For Each Zodiac Sign On December 24, 2024 ‚Äî Jupiter Squares Saturn - YourTango
item.description:
Horoscope For Each Zodiac Sign On December 24, 2024 ‚Äî Jupiter Squares Saturn

Publication Date: December 24, 2024

Source: YourTango

On December 24, 2024, each zodiac sign's daily horoscope reflects the influence of Jupiter, the harbinger of expansion, as it meets Saturn, the master of refinement.

  • Jupiter in Gemini squares Saturn in Pisces, highlighting the need for meaningful growth through shedding the unnecessary.
  • Each zodiac sign's daily horoscope prompts individuals to evaluate their growth and whether their current structures support their spiritual mission.
  • Horoscopes encourage self-reflection and adjustments in personal and professional life.
"Meaningful growth demands shedding the unnecessary."

This cosmic alignment prompts a reassessment of various aspects of life as individuals prepare for transitions and growth opportunities heading into the new year.

item.title: Digvijay Rathee to Jasmine Bhasin; Unfair evictions of Bigg Boss - The Times of India
item.description:
Digvijay Rathee to Jasmine Bhasin; Unfair evictions of Bigg Boss

Updated: Dec 23, 2024 | Source: Times of India

The article discusses the impact of evictions in the popular reality show Bigg Boss, highlighting various contestants including Digvijay Rathee and Jasmine Bhasin. It raises concerns over the fairness of these evictions and the reactions from fans.

  • Digvijay Rathee faced eviction amid controversies regarding the fairness of the decision.
  • Fans believe Rathee was a strong contender who deserved to stay longer on the show.
  • Other contestants like Umar Riaz and Zeeshan Khan also faced similar calls for their evictions being politically motivated.
  • The discussion extends to Jasmine Bhasin and other notable contestants who have made significant impacts during their time on the show.
"Many believe he was a strong contender who deserved to stay longer, leading to widespread calls for his return to the show."

The controversies surrounding evictions on Bigg Boss continue to generate significant discussion among fans, suggesting a deeper engagement with the show's politics and contestant dynamics.

item.title: Pushpa 2 producers give Rs 50 lakhs to stampede victim's family - The Times of India
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Producers Donate Rs 50 Lakhs to Family of Stampede Victim

Publication Date: [Add Date Here] | Source: Times of India

The producers of Pushpa 2 have contributed Rs 50 lakhs to aid the family of a victim who lost their life in a recent stampede during promotional events related to the film. This act of philanthropy aims to support the family in their time of grief and hardship.

  • The donation amount is set at Rs 50 lakhs.
  • The stampede occurred during promotional activities for Pushpa 2.
  • The contribution highlights the producers' commitment to social responsibility.
‚ÄúIn times of crisis, it is essential for us to come together and support those in need,‚Äù said a representative from the production team.

This gesture not only helps the victim's family but also sets an example for other film industries to prioritize social welfare during promotional events.

item.title: Who Is Behind Tarnishing NTR‚Äòs Image? - M9
item.description:
Who Is Behind Tarnishing NTR‚Äòs Image?

Publication Date: Not Specified
Source: M9 News

In recent news, a woman has publicly accused actor NTR of failing to fulfill a promise to help with her son's medical treatment. This has sparked discussions on social media about NTR's charitable commitments.

  • A woman claimed NTR promised to help her critically ill son but did not provide any financial support.
  • During a video call, NTR expressed willingness to assist without specifying an amount.
  • NTR fans contributed to the child's healthcare costs, amounting to 20 Lakhs.
  • The allegations have led to negative publicity and trolling of NTR on social platforms.
  • Experts mentioned that targeting public figures like NTR could discourage future charitable responses.
‚ÄúCharity is always a choice and cannot be demanded.‚Äù

The incident has raised concerns regarding the motivations behind the allegations, suggesting that there may be individuals attempting to harm NTR's reputation.

item.title: Shyam Benegal, a giant of Indian cinema, passes away at 90 - The Hindu
item.description:
Shyam Benegal, a Giant of Indian Cinema, Passes Away at 90

Date & Source: December 23, 2024 - The Hindu

Filmmaker Shyam Benegal, a towering figure in Indian cinema and a leading force behind the Parallel Cinema movement, has passed away at the age of 90 due to kidney-related ailments in Mumbai.

  • Benegal was renowned for his impactful films such as Ankur, Nishant, Mandi, Manthan, and Zubeidaa.
  • He addressed critical social issues, including feudalism and women‚Äôs rights, and experimented with cinematic form.
  • His daughter confirmed his death, citing chronic kidney disease as the cause.
  • Naseeruddin Shah expressed deep gratitude for Benegal‚Äôs mentorship and support throughout his career.
  • He directed notable biopics and received numerous accolades including the Padma Shri and Padma Bhushan.
‚ÄúIt is impossible to describe in a few words what Shyam meant to me.‚Äù - Naseeruddin Shah

Shyam Benegal's legacy will continue to inspire future filmmakers and audiences around the world.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule stampede: Producer of Allu Arjun film donates ‚Çπ50 lakh to victim's family - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Stampede: Producer Donates ‚Çπ50 Lakh to Victim's Family

Publication Date: Dec 23, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The producer of the film Pushpa 2, Naveen Yerneni, has donated ‚Çπ50 lakh to the family of a victim who lost her life in a tragic stampede during the film's premiere.

  • Allu Arjun had previously donated ‚Çπ25 lakh to the same family.
  • Director Sukumar contributed ‚Çπ5 lakh to the victim's family.
  • The stampede occurred on the premiere eve, resulting in the death of a woman and critical injuries to her young son.
  • Naveen Yerneni expressed his condolences and commitment to support the victim's family.
  • In a response to the incident, Allu Arjun's residence was vandalised, leading to police action.
"It's very unfortunate what happened. Revathi's death is a huge loss to her family." - Naveen Yerneni

This tragedy has sparked controversy and highlighted the responsibilities of those involved in large public events. The attention from the media and the public is likely to continue as the impacts of the incident unfold.

item.title: ‚ÄòDon‚Äôt mess with the OG‚Äô ‚Äì AP Dhillon-Diljit Dosanjh feud heats up as fans pick sides - ThePrint
item.description:
‚ÄòDon‚Äôt mess with the OG‚Äô ‚Äì AP Dhillon-Diljit Dosanjh feud heats up as fans pick sides

Publication Date: New Delhi

AP Dhillon and Diljit Dosanjh are embroiled in a heated online feud, igniting passionate responses from fans on both sides. The exchange began following a shoutout from Diljit during his concert.

Key Points:

  • Diljit praised AP Dhillon and Karan Aujla during his concert, leading to Dhillon's response about being blocked on Instagram.
  • Dhillon shared that he has remained out of controversies, questioning Diljit's online interactions.
  • Dosanjh denied ever blocking Dhillon, amidst the social media uproar.
  • Badshah advised both artists to stay united, emphasizing the importance of collaboration over rivalry.
  • Dhillon recently took to the stage to address the rumors, emphasizing their friendship while mocking the narrative pushed by social media.
  • The feud indicates a divide in fan support, with some criticizing Dhillon and others defending him.

Notable Quotes:

‚ÄúIf this social media did not exist then you people would not have become such big artists.‚Äù - Anonymous user on social media
‚ÄúThis social media is all corrupt... we f***ing love each other.‚Äù - AP Dhillon

The unfolding conflict reflects not only personal rivalries but also broader themes within the Punjabi music scene, showcasing the influence of social media on artists' relationships.

item.title: Shyam Benegal, India's Parallel Cinema Pioneer, Dies At 90 - NDTV Movies
item.description:
Shyam Benegal, India's Parallel Cinema Pioneer, Dies At 90

Publication Date: December 15, 2023

Source: PTI

Shyam Benegal, a seminal figure in Indian parallel cinema, passed away at the age of 90 in Mumbai, leaving a significant legacy in filmmaking known for realism and social commentary.

  • Shyam Benegal died on December 14, 2023, after suffering from chronic kidney disease.
  • He was hospitalized in the intensive care unit at Wockhardt Hospital just days after his 90th birthday.
  • His daughter confirmed that he had been ill for several years but was still working on multiple projects.
  • Benegal's last film was the biographical 'Mujib: The Making of a Nation' released in 2023.
  • Known for classic films like 'Bhumika', 'Manthan', and 'Junoon', he is a pivotal figure in Hindi cinema.
‚ÄúI'm working on two to three projects; they are all different from one another.‚Äù - Shyam Benegal on his 90th birthday.

Shyam Benegal's contributions to parallel cinema have left an indelible mark on Indian culture, promoting realism and important social issues through his work.

item.title: RRR Behind and Beyond: OTT release date announced - 123telugu
item.description:
RRR Behind and Beyond: OTT release date announced

Published on Dec 23, 2024 7:58 pm IST

SS Rajamouli's RRR, featuring NTR and Ram Charan, has regained the glory of Indian cinema post-COVID, winning awards including an Oscar. The documentary ‚ÄúRRR Behind and Beyond‚Äù celebrating its making will stream on Netflix starting December 27.

  • The documentary runs for 1 hour and 38 minutes.
  • Highlights include making clips of Charan‚Äôs introduction and the viral song sequence.
  • Netizens have praised the team's hard work and cinematic efforts.
‚ÄúRRR Behind and Beyond‚Äù will reach a wide audience on Netflix.

This documentary showcases the efforts behind RRR and is set to introduce its cinematic journey to an even broader audience via streaming.

item.title: Shyam Benegal, the force behind India‚Äôs parallel cinema movement, dies at 90 - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shyam Benegal, Pioneering Director of India's Parallel Cinema, Passes Away at 90

Publication Date: [Date Not Provided], Source: The Indian Express

Shyam Benegal, a key figure in India's parallel cinema movement, known for his impactful storytelling and social realism, has passed away at the age of 90.

  • Benegal debuted with the film Ankur in 1974, which criticized the caste system and was well-received.
  • He directed notable works including Nishant, Manthan, and the television series Bharat Ek Khoj.
  • His films featured strong, independent female characters and pushed the boundaries of Indian cinema.
  • Despite initial criticism, he remained a significant voice in the film industry, adapting to and experimenting with various themes and formats throughout his career.
‚ÄúI think I have never been in the habit of repeating myself, and that‚Äôs what keeps it interesting for me.‚Äù - Shyam Benegal

Benegal's contributions to cinema not only shaped the parallel movement but also left a lasting impact on Indian storytelling and culture.

item.title: Filmmaker Shyam Benegal passes away - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shyam Benegal, the Force Behind India's Parallel Cinema Movement, Dies at 90

Publication Date: Recent, Source: Indian Express

Shyam Benegal, a pioneering figure in India's parallel cinema movement, passed away at the age of 90, leaving behind a legacy of impactful films and television shows.

  • Benegal made his debut with the acclaimed film Ankur in 1974, critiquing social issues in India.
  • He directed several landmark films such as Nishant, Manthan, and Bhumika.
  • His body of work includes significant television series like Bharat Ek Khoj.
  • Benegal introduced assertive female characters and showcased the talents of actors like Naseeruddin Shah and Shabana Azmi.
  • Despite facing criticism, he continued to create meaningful cinema until his late career.
‚ÄúShyam Benegal‚Äôs movies and aesthetics played a major role in the parallel cinema movement of the 70s and 80s.‚Äù

His films remain influential and relevant, impacting both audiences and subsequent filmmakers.

item.title: Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone reveal daughter Dua's face to paparazzi at private event - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone Reveal Daughter Dua's Face to Paparazzi

Date: Dec 23, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone invited paparazzi to their home to introduce their baby daughter Dua, urging them not to take photos.

  • The couple welcomed their daughter earlier this year and have been keeping her face private.
  • During the meet and greet, they posed for pictures while asking paparazzi to respect their wishes.
  • Fans reacted positively to the couple's reveal with comments praising their family.
"Baby DUA who looks as angelic as an angel, is definitely all set to become the cynosure of every eye!"

The couple's decision highlights their efforts to balance privacy and public interest as they embrace parenthood.

item.title: Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh introduce daughter Dua to paps at private event. See photos - The Indian Express
item.description:
Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh introduce daughter Dua to paps at private event. See photos

Date: December 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

After nearly four months since their daughter‚Äôs arrival, Bollywood actors Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone hosted an event to introduce their daughter, Dua, to the paparazzi.

  • This was the couple's first public appearance since their daughter‚Äôs birth in September.
  • They requested that photographers refrain from taking Dua's pictures.
  • Deepika wore a beautiful beige long dress, and Ranveer donned a white co-ord set.
  • Ranveer was seen affectionately kissing Deepika on the cheek during the event.
‚ÄúThe couple announced their pregnancy in February.‚Äù

The introduction of Dua follows similar events by other Bollywood couples, highlighting a trend of public figures managing their children‚Äôs exposure to media.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 19: Allu Arjun's film earns ‚Çπ12.25 crore | Check total collection | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 19: Allu Arjun‚Äôs Film Earns ‚Çπ12.25 Crore

Date: December 23, 2024 Source: Live Mint

Pushpa 2: The Rule has made remarkable earnings at the box office, collecting ‚Çπ12.25 crore net on its 19th day of release.

  • The film has achieved an overall domestic gross of ‚Çπ1074.85 crore.
  • During its third weekend, it made a total of ‚Çπ57.7 crore net.
  • It crossed the ‚Çπ50 crore mark in its third weekend, maintaining its position as a top choice for moviegoers.
  • Worldwide, the film grossed ‚Çπ1506.70 crore in 18 days, with ‚Çπ240 crore coming from overseas.
  • To become the second-biggest Indian grosser, it needs about ‚Çπ280 crores more.
‚Äú#Pushpa2 crosses the ‚Çπ50 cr mark in Weekend 3, which is absolutely fantastic‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äî Taran Adarsh

Overall, Pushpa 2 continues to perform strongly, with significant implications for its worldwide box office rankings.

item.title: Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh formally introduce daughter Dua to paparazzi - Bollywood Life
item.description:
Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh Introduce Daughter Dua to the Public

Published: December 23, 2024 6:42 PM IST | Source: BollywoodLife

Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone have introduced their baby daughter Dua to the paparazzi after keeping her away from the limelight since her birth on September 8, 2024.

  • Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh welcomed their daughter Dua, meaning Prayer, on September 8, 2024.
  • The couple organized a small celebration to introduce Dua to select paparazzi, with a condition that no pictures of her would be taken.
  • Ranveer expressed immense joy in welcoming 'laxmi' into their home during the gathering.
  • Deepika made her first public appearance post-birth at a concert in Bangalore, emphasizing her commitment to motherhood.
  • The actress is expected to resume work soon with upcoming projects like Kalki 2898 AD part 2.
‚ÄúDeepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh invited paps to meet baby Dua today.‚Äù ‚Äî Deepika Padukone Fanpage

The couple's gathering has since gone viral, showcasing their willingness to slowly introduce their daughter‚Äôs presence in the public eye.
